questions.question: How do I scan the QR code?
questions.answer: Simply open your phone's camera and point it at the QR code on your table. A notification will appear - tap it to open the menu. You can also use our 'SCAN QR' button on the homepage.

questions.question: The QR code is not scanning
questions.answer: Please ensure: 1) Your camera has permission to access 2) The QR code is well-lit 3) Hold your phone steady 4) Try cleaning your camera lens. If issues persist, use the 'Find Food' option to browse restaurants.

questions.question: Can I scan the QR code without downloading an app?
questions.answer: Yes! Ordyrr is completely web-based. No app download required. Just scan the QR code with your phone's camera and start ordering instantly.

questions.question: What if my phone camera doesn't work?
questions.answer: You can use the 'Find Food' option to search for restaurants by location, or ask your server for assistance. You can also try using a different phone or tablet.

questions.question: The QR code shows an error
questions.answer: This might happen if: 1) The QR code is damaged 2) It's not an Ordyrr QR code 3) The restaurant is temporarily offline. Please inform your server or try again in a few moments.

questions.question: How do I place an order?
questions.answer: After scanning the QR code: 1) Browse the menu 2) Tap items to add to cart 3) Customize if needed 4) Review your cart 5) Tap 'Place Order'. Your order goes directly to the kitchen!

questions.question: Can I customize my order?
questions.answer: Yes! Most items have customization options. Tap on an item, then select your preferences (spice level, toppings, cooking style, etc.) before adding to cart.

questions.question: How do I add special instructions?
questions.answer: When viewing an item, you'll see a 'Special Instructions' field. Add any dietary requirements, allergies, or preferences there. The kitchen will see your notes.

questions.question: Can I order for multiple people?
questions.answer: Absolutely! Add items for everyone at your table to one cart. You can split the payment later or have one person pay for all.

questions.question: What's the minimum order amount?
questions.answer: There's no minimum order amount! Order as little or as much as you'd like. Some restaurants may have minimum delivery amounts, but dine-in orders have no minimum.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept all major credit/debit cards, UPI, digital wallets (Google Pay, PhonePe, Paytm), and cash. Payment methods may vary by restaurant.

questions.question: Is it safe to pay online?
questions.answer: Absolutely! We use industry-standard encryption and secure payment gateways. Your card details are never stored on our servers. All transactions are PCI-DSS compliant.

questions.question: Can I split the bill?
questions.answer: Yes! When checking out, select 'Split Bill' option. You can split equally or by items. Each person can pay their share using their preferred payment method.

questions.question: Do you charge service fees?
questions.answer: Ordyrr doesn't charge any service fees for dine-in orders! You only pay for your food and applicable taxes. Some restaurants may add their own service charges.

questions.question: Can I pay with cash?
questions.answer: Yes, you can choose 'Pay at Counter' or 'Cash on Table' when checking out. Your order will still go to the kitchen immediately.

questions.question: I was charged twice
questions.answer: Don't worry! If you see duplicate charges, one is likely a temporary authorization that will be released within 2-3 business days. If both charges settle, contact support immediately with your order ID.

questions.question: Can I get a receipt?
questions.answer: Yes! After payment, you'll receive a digital receipt via email and SMS. You can also view it in 'My Orders' section. Request a printed receipt from your server if needed.

questions.question: How do I apply a discount code?
questions.answer: In your cart, look for 'Apply Coupon' or 'Promo Code' field. Enter your code and tap 'Apply'. The discount will reflect in your total before payment.

questions.question: My payment failed but money was deducted
questions.answer: If payment fails, any deducted amount is typically refunded within 5-7 business days. Check your order status in 'My Orders'. Contact support with transaction ID if not refunded.

questions.question: Can I tip the staff?
questions.answer: Yes! You can add a tip when checking out. Choose a percentage (10%, 15%, 20%) or enter a custom amount. Tips go directly to the restaurant staff.

questions.question: How do I view the menu?
questions.answer: After scanning the QR code, the menu opens automatically! Browse by categories, use filters (Veg/Non-Veg/Bestsellers), or search for specific items.

questions.question: Are prices shown inclusive of taxes?
questions.answer: Prices shown are base prices. Taxes (GST/VAT) and any service charges are added at checkout. You'll see the complete breakdown before confirming your order.

questions.question: Can I see nutritional information?
questions.answer: Yes! Tap on any item to see detailed nutritional info including calories, allergens, ingredients, and dietary tags (Vegan, Gluten-Free, etc.).

questions.question: What does 'Chef's Special' mean?
questions.answer: 'Chef's Special' items are signature dishes recommended by the restaurant. They're usually unique recipes or customer favorites worth trying!

questions.question: How do I filter vegetarian items?
questions.answer: Use the filter chips at the top of the menu. Tap 'Veg' to show only vegetarian items. You can also combine filters like 'Veg + Bestsellers'.

questions.question: Are menu prices accurate?
questions.answer: Yes! Prices are updated in real-time by the restaurant. If you notice any discrepancy, please inform your server or contact support.

questions.question: Can I save favorite items?
questions.answer: Yes! Tap the heart icon on any item to add it to your favorites. Access them quickly from 'My Favorites' in your profile.

questions.question: What if an item is out of stock?
questions.answer: Out of stock items are marked as 'Unavailable' and can't be added to cart. The restaurant updates availability in real-time. Try similar items or ask your server.

questions.question: Do you have combo meals?
questions.answer: Many restaurants offer combo meals and meal deals! Look for 'Combos' or 'Meal Deals' category in the menu. These often provide better value.

questions.question: Can I see food images?
questions.answer: Yes! Most items have high-quality images. Tap on an item to see larger photos and detailed descriptions. Some items may have multiple images.

questions.question: How do I track my order?
questions.answer: After placing your order, you'll see real-time status updates: Order Received ‚Üí Preparing ‚Üí Ready ‚Üí Served. Check 'My Orders' or you'll get notifications for each stage.

questions.question: How long will my order take?
questions.answer: Estimated preparation time is shown when you place the order (usually 15-30 minutes). Actual time may vary based on kitchen workload and item complexity.

questions.question: Can I cancel my order?
questions.answer: You can cancel within 2 minutes of placing the order. After that, the kitchen starts preparing and cancellation isn't possible. Contact your server for assistance.

questions.question: My order is taking too long
questions.answer: We apologize for the delay! Check your order status in 'My Orders'. If it's been over 45 minutes, please inform your server or contact support with your order ID.

questions.question: Can I modify my order after placing it?
questions.answer: Modifications are possible within 2 minutes of ordering. After that, contact your server immediately - they may be able to help if the kitchen hasn't started preparing.

questions.question: Will I get notifications?
questions.answer: Yes! You'll receive push notifications and SMS updates when: Order is confirmed, Preparation starts, Food is ready, and Order is served. Enable notifications for best experience.

questions.question: What does 'Preparing' mean?
questions.answer: 'Preparing' means the kitchen has started cooking your order. You can expect your food soon! The status will update to 'Ready' when it's done.

questions.question: Can I reorder the same items?
questions.answer: Yes! Go to 'My Orders', find your previous order, and tap 'Reorder'. All items will be added to your cart instantly. You can modify before placing.

questions.question: Where can I see my order history?
questions.answer: Tap on your profile icon and select 'My Orders'. You'll see all your past orders with dates, items, and amounts. You can also download receipts.

questions.question: My order status is not updating
questions.answer: Try refreshing the page or checking your internet connection. If the issue persists, the restaurant may be experiencing technical difficulties. Contact your server.

questions.question: Do I need to create an account?
questions.answer: No! You can order as a guest. However, creating an account lets you save favorites, track orders, earn rewards, and get personalized recommendations.

questions.question: How do I create an account?
questions.answer: Tap 'Sign Up' on the homepage. Enter your phone number, verify with OTP, and add your name and email. That's it! You can also sign up with Google.

questions.question: I forgot my password
questions.answer: Tap 'Forgot Password' on the login page. Enter your registered phone number or email. You'll receive an OTP to reset your password.

questions.question: How do I change my phone number?
questions.answer: Go to Profile ‚Üí Settings ‚Üí Phone Number. Enter your new number and verify with OTP. Your account data will be transferred to the new number.

questions.question: Can I delete my account?
questions.answer: Yes. Go to Profile ‚Üí Settings ‚Üí Account ‚Üí Delete Account. Note: This permanently deletes all your data, order history, and rewards. This action cannot be undone.

questions.question: How do I update my email?
questions.answer: Go to Profile ‚Üí Settings ‚Üí Email Address. Enter your new email and verify it with the OTP sent to that email.

questions.question: Is my data safe?
questions.answer: Absolutely! We use bank-grade encryption to protect your data. We never share your personal information with third parties without consent. Read our Privacy Policy for details.

questions.question: Can I have multiple accounts?
questions.answer: Each phone number can have one account. If you need to switch accounts, log out and log in with a different number. We recommend using one account for better rewards tracking.

questions.question: How do I log out?
questions.answer: Go to Profile ‚Üí Settings ‚Üí Log Out. You'll be signed out from this device. Your data is saved and you can log back in anytime.

questions.question: Can I use the same account on multiple devices?
questions.answer: Yes! Log in with your phone number on any device. Your favorites, orders, and rewards sync across all devices automatically.

questions.question: The app is not loading
questions.answer: Try these steps: 1) Check your internet connection 2) Clear browser cache 3) Try a different browser 4) Restart your phone. If issues persist, contact support.

questions.question: I'm getting an error message
questions.answer: Please note the error code/message and contact support. Common fixes: Refresh the page, clear cache, check internet connection, or try again in a few minutes.

questions.question: The menu is not displaying properly
questions.answer: This might be a browser compatibility issue. Try: 1) Update your browser 2) Use Chrome/Safari 3) Clear cache and cookies 4) Disable ad blockers.

questions.question: I can't add items to cart
questions.answer: Ensure: 1) Item is available (not out of stock) 2) You have internet connection 3) Browser cookies are enabled. Try refreshing the page or clearing cache.

questions.question: My location is not being detected
questions.answer: Enable location permissions in your browser settings. On mobile: Settings ‚Üí Browser ‚Üí Permissions ‚Üí Location ‚Üí Allow. Then refresh the page.

questions.question: I'm not receiving OTP
questions.answer: Check: 1) Phone number is correct 2) SMS inbox (not spam) 3) Network signal. Wait 2-3 minutes. If still not received, tap 'Resend OTP' or try email OTP.

questions.question: The page keeps refreshing
questions.answer: This might be a browser issue. Try: 1) Clear cache and cookies 2) Disable browser extensions 3) Use incognito/private mode 4) Try a different browser.

questions.question: Images are not loading
questions.answer: Check your internet speed. On slow connections, images may take time. Try: 1) Refresh page 2) Switch to WiFi 3) Clear cache. Images are optimized but need stable connection.

questions.question: I can't log in
questions.answer: Verify: 1) Phone number/email is correct 2) Password is correct (case-sensitive) 3) Account exists. Use 'Forgot Password' if needed. Contact support if locked out.

questions.question: The app is very slow
questions.answer: Slow performance can be due to: 1) Weak internet 2) Old device 3) Too many browser tabs. Try: Close other apps, clear cache, use WiFi, or update your browser.

questions.question: How do I earn rewards?
questions.answer: Earn points on every order! Points = Order Value √∑ 10. Example: ‚Çπ500 order = 50 points. Redeem points for discounts. Also earn bonus points on special occasions!

questions.question: How do I redeem my points?
questions.answer: At checkout, you'll see 'Use Rewards Points' option. 100 points = ‚Çπ10 discount. Select how many points to redeem. Discount applies instantly to your total.

questions.question: Do my points expire?
questions.answer: Points are valid for 1 year from the date earned. You'll receive reminders before expiry. Keep ordering to keep earning and extending validity!

questions.question: Where can I see my rewards balance?
questions.answer: Go to Profile ‚Üí Rewards. You'll see total points, points history, expiry dates, and available offers. Track your progress towards next reward tier!

questions.question: Are there any current offers?
questions.answer: Check 'Offers' section on homepage or in your profile. We have restaurant-specific offers, first-order discounts, festival specials, and referral bonuses!

questions.question: How does the referral program work?
questions.answer: Share your referral code with friends. When they place their first order, you both get ‚Çπ100 credit! Find your code in Profile ‚Üí Refer & Earn. No limit on referrals!

questions.question: Can I combine multiple offers?
questions.answer: Usually, only one offer/coupon can be used per order. However, you can combine offers with rewards points redemption. Check offer terms for specific details.

questions.question: My coupon code is not working
questions.answer: Check: 1) Code is typed correctly 2) Not expired 3) Minimum order value met 4) Applicable to your restaurant/items. Some codes are restaurant-specific or user-specific.

questions.question: Do I get birthday rewards?
questions.answer: Yes! Add your birthday in Profile ‚Üí Settings. You'll receive a special birthday offer valid for the entire birthday month. Enjoy your special day with us! üéÇ

questions.question: What are reward tiers?
questions.answer: We have 3 tiers: Silver (0-999 points), Gold (1000-4999), Platinum (5000+). Higher tiers get better rewards, exclusive offers, and priority support!

questions.question: How do I find restaurants near me?
questions.answer: Tap 'Find Food' on homepage. Allow location access or enter your area manually. You'll see all nearby restaurants with ratings, cuisines, and distance.

questions.question: Can I see restaurant ratings?
questions.answer: Yes! Each restaurant shows star rating (1-5), total reviews, and popular dishes. Tap on restaurant to see detailed reviews from other customers.

questions.question: What are restaurant timings?
questions.answer: Restaurant hours are shown on their profile page. Most restaurants update their availability in real-time. Closed restaurants won't accept orders.

questions.question: Can I call the restaurant?
questions.answer: Yes! Restaurant phone number is available on their profile page. Tap the phone icon to call directly. Use this for special requests or queries.

questions.question: How do I know if a restaurant is open?
questions.answer: Open restaurants show 'Open Now' badge in green. Closed ones show 'Closed' in red with opening time. You can only order from open restaurants.

questions.question: Can I see restaurant photos?
questions.answer: Yes! Restaurant profile has photos of ambiance, dishes, and menu. Many photos are uploaded by customers. Tap to view full gallery.

questions.question: What cuisines are available?
questions.answer: Filter restaurants by cuisine: Indian, Chinese, Italian, Mexican, Continental, Fast Food, Desserts, and more! Use cuisine filters in restaurant search.

questions.question: Can I save favorite restaurants?
questions.answer: Yes! Tap the heart icon on any restaurant to add to favorites. Access them quickly from Profile ‚Üí Favorite Restaurants for easy reordering.

questions.question: How is delivery time calculated?
questions.answer: For dine-in, preparation time is shown (15-30 min usually). For delivery, it includes prep time + distance. Actual time may vary based on kitchen load.

questions.question: Can I see restaurant menu without scanning QR?
questions.answer: Yes! Browse restaurants via 'Find Food', tap any restaurant, and view their full menu. You can order for delivery or save for later dine-in.

questions.question: How do I rate my order?
questions.answer: After your order is delivered/served, you'll get a rating prompt. Rate food quality, service, and overall experience (1-5 stars). Add comments if you wish!

questions.question: Can I report an issue with my order?
questions.answer: Yes! Go to My Orders ‚Üí Select order ‚Üí Report Issue. Choose issue type (wrong item, quality, missing item, etc.). Support will contact you within 24 hours.

questions.question: How do I contact customer support?
questions.answer: Multiple ways: 1) Live Chat (this!) 2) Email: support@ordyrr.com 3) Phone: +91-XXXX-XXXXXX 4) In-app support ticket. We're here 24/7!

questions.question: What if I received wrong order?
questions.answer: Immediately contact your server or tap 'Report Issue' in My Orders. Provide order ID and photo if possible. We'll resolve it ASAP - replacement or refund.

questions.question: Can I get a refund?
questions.answer: Refunds are processed for: Cancelled orders (within 2 min), wrong items, quality issues, or non-delivery. Refund takes 5-7 business days to reflect in your account.

questions.question: How long does support take to respond?
questions.answer: Live chat: Instant! Email: Within 24 hours. Phone: Immediate. Support tickets: 24-48 hours. For urgent issues, use live chat or phone.

questions.question: Can I edit my review?
questions.answer: Yes! Go to My Orders ‚Üí Select order ‚Üí View Review ‚Üí Edit. You can update rating and comments within 30 days of posting. Be fair and honest!

questions.question: What happens to my feedback?
questions.answer: Your feedback helps us improve! Restaurant owners see ratings and work on issues. We analyze feedback to enhance app features. Your voice matters!

questions.question: Can I suggest new features?
questions.answer: Absolutely! We love user suggestions. Email us at feedback@ordyrr.com or use 'Suggest Feature' in app settings. Best suggestions get implemented!

questions.question: How do I report a bug?
questions.answer: Found a bug? Help us fix it! Go to Settings ‚Üí Report Bug. Describe the issue, add screenshots if possible. Our tech team will investigate immediately.

questions.question: Is contactless ordering safe?
questions.answer: Yes! QR ordering minimizes physical contact. No need to touch physical menus or wait for servers. Order, pay, and track - all from your phone. Completely safe!

questions.question: How do you ensure food hygiene?
questions.answer: Partner restaurants follow strict hygiene protocols: Regular sanitization, health certificates, quality checks, and hygiene ratings. We audit restaurants regularly.

questions.question: Can I see restaurant hygiene ratings?
questions.answer: Yes! Restaurant profiles show hygiene rating (A+, A, B, C). Based on: Kitchen cleanliness, food handling, staff hygiene, and regular inspections.

questions.question: What if I have food allergies?
questions.answer: IMPORTANT: Always inform restaurant staff about allergies! Check item ingredients in menu. Add allergy info in special instructions. We take allergies seriously.

questions.question: Is my payment information secure?
questions.answer: 100% secure! We use PCI-DSS compliant payment gateways with 256-bit encryption. Card details are never stored. All transactions are monitored for fraud.

questions.question: How is my personal data protected?
questions.answer: We follow strict data protection laws (GDPR compliant). Your data is encrypted, never sold to third parties, and used only for service improvement. Read our Privacy Policy.

questions.question: Can I report food quality issues?
questions.answer: Yes, please do! Go to My Orders ‚Üí Report Issue ‚Üí Food Quality. Describe the problem with photos if possible. We'll investigate and take appropriate action.

questions.question: What if I get food poisoning?
questions.answer: We're sorry to hear that! Seek medical attention immediately. Then contact support with order details and medical report. We'll investigate with the restaurant urgently.

questions.question: Are restaurants verified?
questions.answer: Yes! All restaurants are verified with: FSSAI license, business registration, hygiene inspection, and background checks. Only certified restaurants partner with us.

questions.question: How do I know food is freshly prepared?
questions.answer: Orders go directly to kitchen in real-time. Track preparation status live. Most restaurants prepare food only after receiving your order. No pre-cooked meals!

questions.question: What is Ordyrr?
questions.answer: Ordyrr is India's fastest dine-in ordering platform! Scan QR codes at restaurant tables, browse menus, order food, and pay - all from your phone. No app download needed!

questions.question: Which cities are you available in?
questions.answer: We're expanding rapidly! Currently in 50+ cities across India. Check 'Find Food' to see restaurants in your area. New cities added every week!

questions.question: Is Ordyrr free to use?
questions.answer: Yes! Ordyrr is completely free for customers. No subscription, no hidden charges. You only pay for your food. We don't add any platform fees!

questions.question: Do I need internet to use Ordyrr?
questions.answer: Yes, you need an active internet connection (WiFi or mobile data) to browse menus and place orders. Most restaurants offer free WiFi for customers.

questions.question: Can I use Ordyrr for takeaway?
questions.answer: Yes! Many restaurants support takeaway orders. Select 'Takeaway' option when ordering. You'll get notification when order is ready for pickup.

questions.question: Is Ordyrr available for home delivery?
questions.answer: Currently, Ordyrr focuses on dine-in and takeaway. Home delivery is coming soon! Meanwhile, use our partner delivery services for home orders.

questions.question: How does Ordyrr make money?
questions.answer: We charge a small commission to restaurants (not customers!). This helps us maintain the platform, add features, and provide support. Win-win for everyone!

questions.question: Can restaurants join Ordyrr?
questions.answer: Yes! We're always onboarding new restaurants. Visit ordyrr.com/partner or email partners@ordyrr.com. Benefits: Increase orders, reduce wait time, digital payments!

questions.question: What languages is Ordyrr available in?
questions.answer: Currently: English and Hindi. Coming soon: Tamil, Telugu, Kannada, Malayalam, Bengali, Marathi, and more! Change language in Settings ‚Üí Language.

questions.question: How can I stay updated with Ordyrr?
questions.answer: Follow us on social media! Instagram: @ordyrr, Twitter: @ordyrr_official, Facebook: Ordyrr. Also enable push notifications for offers and updates!
